channel.title: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can
channel.description:
I should have posted this earlier sorry. it lasts for 10 days!
https://market.android.com/details?id=apps_timed_promotion&feature=banner#?t=W251bGwsMSwyLDIwMSwibnVsbC10b3BfZmVhdHVyZWRfbXVsdGlfX18xX3Byb21vXzEzMjMyMjA0NjcyNjMiXQ&purchaseButton=89B46gpGlVgVsmQ31DVqA4svEdQ%3D
I think every day will have 10 new apps for a dime each but im not sure. If thats how it is the first days apps are still available. hurry while you can. I bought 5 of the 10. I had to go to bestbuy and log on to one of the display demo devices so I could download Minecraft. minecraft is definitely worth the $0.10 I have only played the demo so far though.
EDIT: also I thought i would add for anyone that doesn't know google music is open to the public now so feel free to sign up with you google account been using it since it was in beta, its pretty nice.

item.title: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

xryz:

I think the apps change around noon EST. I bought a couple apps today but there isnt really any good apps today. Oh you can thank who ever manages the minecraft facebook page, b/c that how i first learned about this.

Yeah it’s 4PM GMT, sure we would’ve found out about it eventually

item.title: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

My reviews:
Minecraft Pocket Edition - Basically the classic version of minecraft ported over to work on mobile phones. From what I can tell there are no cave systems or anything for survival mode to have been started, even though promised. There is a major lack of updates and news on Mojangs part so I do regret spending the original $7USD on it, $0.10 is still much worth it though as it makes it a easy way to plan out your next build on multiplayer before wasting supplies.

Swiftkey X Keyboard - I got this free from the Amazon app store for the ‘free app of the day’ and really love it. It learns how you text/type and can predict what you will type next much better than the stock keyboard, or even the well known Swype keyboard. So far for my 6 or so months of using it, it actually has predicted a 20- word text message for me several times.

Fieldrunners HD - I got this free on the Amazon app store for the ‘free app of the day’ thing. I can’'t really give a good review or a bad review other than I prefer ‘Robodefence’ much more, but its basically, in a way, a tower defence-ish styled game.

EDIT: Well it looks like I’ll be buying Asphalt 6, been debating on it for 2 days now, quite nice to see it majorly discounted.

Read full topic
item.source: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can

item.title: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

I played it on sg2 max gfx setting; no lag(idk how high-end of a phone you would need to not lag though). looks real nice, and the touchscreen controls aren’t bad at all. they may need some tweaking possibly but for the most part I think it is overall a very nice game app. you obviously cant can’t compare it to the PC edition like some reviewers have. too bad I didn’t get to play it on the galaxy tab. its actually quite interesting, though it is just creative mode atm no survival mode that I know of.

Read full topic
item.source: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can

item.description:

Mine craft pocket edition? I don’t get how that could be possible, it would have to be really really really really low resolution and need a high end phone to run without lag. D:

item.source: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can

item.title: Have android? get your $0.10 apps while you can
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

you have a google account? do u have a friend with a higher end android device? if both are true then ask you friend if you can use their device to sign in with your account. after its signs in and says that it is one of your devices you can go to settings > accounts and remove your google account.

That should be all you have to do. thats practically what I did at best buy except i went and DL’d MC:PE then removed my account but on my google account it lists the galaxy tab under my devices(im sure my data is safe, I know the account is removed but idk why the device is still listed.) so now i can buy most of the apps on the market.

Read full topic
